company_name: PT. Gunung Ansa (Harris Vertu & Yello Hotels Harmoni)
recommended_degree: Informatika, Teknik Komputer Dan Jaringan, Sistem informasi (Diploma, Sarjana)
job_description:
Provide technical support to employees for hardware, software, and network issues.
Assist in installation, configuration, and maintenance of computers, printers, and other IT equipment.
Help maintain and update system documentation, inventory, and user guides.
Support IT staff in performing system upgrades, patches, and routine maintenance.
Troubleshoot basic technical problems and escalate complex issues as needed.
Set up user accounts, permissions, and workstations for new employees.
Participate in cybersecurity awareness tasks (password resets, policy updates, scanning tools, etc.).
Assist with IT projects such as network improvements, system migrations, or software rollouts.
Perform data entry, backups, and file organization as assigned.
